title: Amazon Essentials Men's Tank Top, Regular-Fit Undershirt
description: REGULAR FIT: This basic tank top is ideal for everyday wear with easy movement through the shoulders, chest, and waist
LIGHTWEIGHT JERSEY: Experience softness and comfort with this lightweight tank top
VERSATILE STYLE: This men’s tank top can be layered with shirts and paired with shorts, jeans, or chinos for a relaxed look
CLEAN DETAILS: This cotton tank top features jersey binding at armholes and neck for a polished appearance, as well as a tagless label for added comfort
DURABLE FABRIC: The solid tank tops are crafted from 100% cotton, while the heathered shirt options come in a cotton-poly blend

Stay cool and comfortable this summer with our versatile cotton tank tops, designed for men who appreciate both style and ease. These basic tank tops are crafted from lightweight jersey fabric, for a soft and comfortable feel. The men's cotton tank tops provide an easy fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist, offering a regular fit that accommodates your movement. These tank tops are not only ideal as undershirts but for casual wear as well.
